welcomePage.title: Welcome to BMO Partners Group Private Markets Fund Smart Form
welcomePage.description: This tool will provide you with PDF forms ready for signature or e-signature.
welcomePage.pdfListTitle: Printable PDFs generated as part of the Sub-Agreement smart form:
pdfItems: Application for a Series F Subscription Agreement
Annex A - Certificate of Subscriber's Agent
Annex C - Consent to Electronic Delivery
Annex D - Fatca and CRS Identification Forms
Annex E - Contact Information for Securities Regulatory Authorities
Managed Account Bulk Purchase Spreadsheet (If Applicable)
welcomePage.note: The data gathered in the Smart Form App is not stored by BMO, therefore must be fully completed in one session, otherwise progress will be lost.
